submission:
class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        ans = []
        s = n - 1
        f = [[i + 1, i - 1] for i in range(n)]
        #print(f)
        for u, v in queries:
            if f[u][0] < v and f[u][0] >= 0:
                s = s + 1
                i = u
                while i < v:
                    s = s - 1
                    tmp = f[i][0]
                    f[i][0] = -1
                    i = tmp
                    
                f[u][0] = v
            ans.append(s)

        return ans
